SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Administrator
 
AdministratorController
Controller class for managing administrator-related operations.
AdministratorRepository
The AdministratorRepository class provides methods to manage administrators in the Hospital Management System, including functionalities for validation, password management, and handling security questions.
AdministratorView
The AdministratorView class provides the user interface for administrators in the Hospital Management System.
Appointment
Represents an appointment in the system.
AppointmentController
Controller class for managing appointments, including creation, cancellation, rescheduling, and listing of appointments.
AppointmentOutcome
Represents the outcome of an appointment in the system.
AppointmentOutcomeController
Controller class for managing appointment outcomes.
AppointmentOutcomeRepository
The AppointmentOutcomeRepository class provides methods to manage appointment outcomes within the Hospital Management System.
AppointmentOutcomeService
Interface for managing appointment outcomes.
AppointmentRepository
The AppointmentRepository class provides methods to manage appointments within the Hospital Management System.
AuthenticationController
 
Availability
Represents the availability of a doctor on a specific date and time.
AvailabilityController
Controller class for managing doctor availability.
AvailabilityRepository
The AvailabilityRepository class manages the availability data of doctors.
ChangeSecurityQuestionInterface
Interface for managing the change of security questions for users.
checkHaveQuestionsInterface
Interface for handling security questions related to user authentication.
CSVUtil
Utility class for handling CSV file operations, such as removing empty rows.
DateTimeUtil
Utility class for handling date and time operations.
Doctor
Represents a doctor in the system.
DoctorController
Manages doctor-related operations.
DoctorRepository
Repository class responsible for handling CRUD operations on Doctor data stored in a CSV file.
DoctorView
The DoctorView class handles the user interface for doctors.
HMSmain
The main entry point for the Hospital Management System (HMS).
InventoryManagement
Interface for managing medication inventory.
LoginController
Controller class for managing user login functionality.
MedicalRecord
Represents a medical record associated with a patient and a doctor.
MedicalRecordController
The MedicalRecordController class provides methods for managing medical records.
MedicalRecordRepository
The MedicalRecordRepository class manages CRUD operations for medical records stored in a CSV file.
MedicationInventory
Represents the inventory information of a specific medication.
MedicationInventoryController
The MedicationInventoryController class manages medication inventory operations.
MedicationInventoryRepository
Repository class for managing medication inventory and replenishment requests.
MenuInterface
The MenuInterface interface defines a method for displaying a menu specific to a user within the system.
PasswordChangerInterface
The PasswordChangerInterface interface defines a method for changing the password of a user based on their hospital ID.
PasswordController
The PasswordController class provides methods for hashing passwords and changing passwords for users based on their hospital ID.
PasswordForgetView
The PasswordForgetView class handles the user interface for password recovery.
Patient
Represents a patient in the hospital system.
PatientController
The PatientController class provides methods to manage and update patient information.
PatientRepository
The PatientRepository class handles all operations related to the storage and retrieval of patient data in a CSV file.
PatientView
The PatientView class handles the user interface for patients.
PaymentController
The PaymentController class handles payment-related operations for medical appointments.
Pharmacist
Represents a pharmacist in the hospital system.
PharmacistController
The PharmacistController class manages inventory and replenishment requests for medications.
PharmacistRepository
 
PharmacistView
The PharmacistView class provides the user interface for pharmacists.
ReplenishmentRequestRepository
Repository class for managing replenishment requests.
ReplenishmentRequests
Represents a replenishment request for medication inventory.
ReplenishmentRequestService
The ReplenishmentRequestService interface defines methods for managing medication replenishment requests and checking inventory levels.
RepositoryController
The RepositoryController class provides a centralized way to access various repository objects based on user roles.
SecurityQuestionsController
The SecurityQuestionsController class provides methods for managing security questions for different user roles.
User
Abstract class representing a generic user in the system.
ValidationInterface
The ValidationInterface interface defines a method for validating user credentials.
ViewController
The ViewController class provides an interface for accessing different view objects based on a specified role.
